DOC.detailed_description: 2,000 Participant My Research Legacy Pilot Study 1 . Day 0 - Enroll online , complete AHA 's Life 's Simple 7™ Survey Prospective participant enroll research initiative via My Research Legacy website ( MyResearchLegacy.org ) . They go online process answer brief , pre-qualifying question consent participate study . - Participants attest age US residence , provide self-reported diagnosis cardiovascular disease ( myocardial infarction , atrial fibrillation , aortic dissection , systolic congestive heart failure/cardiomyopathy ) and/or stroke . - Eligible participant read sign online consent form . - Within participant console , participant answer AHA 's Life 's Simple 7™ My Life Check v4.0 assessment . - Participants ask consent process consent provide medical record relevant diagnosis . 2 . Saliva kit send - If participant choose participate genome sequence portion study , participant receive saliva collection kit . - DNA extract saliva sample . - Genomic sequence analysis perform . 3 . Day 90 Complete AHA 's Life 's Simple 7™ My Life Check v4.0 assessment ; Start transmission Fitbit Charge 2 . 4 . Online Survey contact Day 180 enrollment , participant receive email request visit participant console repeat AHA 's Life 's Simple 7™ My Life Check v4.0 survey . Participants also option determine whether want contact future study .
